function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for virus or bacteria to be brought into housing from external sources","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the living space","Mitigation":"Implement body cleaning protocols before entering living space, minimize sharing facilities, add signage for physical distancing, and reduce sharing vertical shaft system","Technologies":"Signage for physical distancing, individualized systems for reducing virus spread","People":"Residents, building management","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Lack of good air circulation and natural ventilation in housing design","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and reduced overall health and well-being","Mitigation":"Implement biophilic design principles, provide good air circulation, natural ventilation, exposure to daylight, and connection to natural elements","Technologies":"Biophilic design elements, natural ventilation systems","People":"Residents, building designers, architects","Owner":"Building designers, architects"}]}
